Text.valUnicode:
This program enable new client record to be created, existin g record to be amended, reviewed, or deleted.
The amend routine permits the change of any client detail ot her than the Client ID code or the account balances. If balances exist, the rec cannot be deleted
CLIENT ID ========= It is recommended that a consistent approach should be adopt ed in assigning the CLIENT ID code.
Eg If Corporate Client: i. Use standard abbreviation of the company. Eg SI A ii. For financial institution, each branch will be treated as a separate entity and aunique Client ID will be a ssigned for each branch. Eg OCBCMAIN, OCBCTANJO , OCBCSHENT iii. If there are no standard abbreviation for the company, use the first 5-letter of the first name and th e last 5 letter of the last name If individual Client : i. 3:3:4 approach for chinese name Ie first 3 lette r of the first name, first 3 letters of the second name a nd first 4 letters of the last name ii. If it is a non chinese name, assign 5 by 5 basi s Ie first 5 letter of the first name and first 5 let ter of lastname
A/C TYPE ======== Coporate or individual. For individual, business nature, dat e incorp and date commenced will not be applicable
GST Status ========= Zero Rated - for zero rated client in which GST is not appli cable Standard Rated - For standard rated client in which GST is a pplicable Exempted - For client in which GST is exempted
CLASS ====== This is a alternate sort key to facilitate accessing of the files to print reports such as Client Master Listing, Balanc e Listing, Statement of Account & Ageing Listing
MAIN GROUP ============ Can be used for industrial grouping of client. Eg Bankers, C ommissioner of Oaths / Notary Public, Developers, Finance co mpanies etc. Code is applicable for analysis of Fee by Indus tries Report
SUB GROUP =========== Further sub grouping of Main Group above. Eg Bankers main gr oup can be further sub group into local, foreign, offshore a nd Industries report
CREATED ======== The creation date of the client's master maintenance.
TERM ===== Credit rating of client. Infor will be printed on aged Recei vable listing
LAST A/C ON =========== Updated by system with the creation date of the last file cr eated for client
MATTER YTD ============ Display the total no of files for the year
MATTER TOTAL ============== Display the total no fo files opened for the client up till to date
NAME ===== The full client name
REFERRAL ========== The party that introduce the client to the legal firm
PHONE ====== Client's phone number
FAX === Client's fax number
SENIOR PARTNER ================ Senior partner that is in charge of the client
PARTNER ========= Partner that is in charge of the client
SOLICITOR ========== The solicitor incharge of the client. to facilitate printing of Client's Master listing and Client's Balance listing by this solicitor code.
COUNTRY ========= A 2 digit code defined in Misc Table Maintenance with the ta ble header 'COUNTRY'
DATE INCORPORATED ==================== Date of incorporation. Relevant only if legal firm is handli ng the secretarial work
DATE COMMENCED ================= Date of commencement of business. Relevant only if legal fir m is handling the secretarial work
BUSINESS NATURE ================= To indicate the nature or type of business the client engage d in
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ======================== For general description of client. Can use this field to ent er any information of interest pertaining to client involved . Information will be printed on Account Master Listing
Corporate or Non-Corporatel client. For Individual client, b usiness nature, Date of Incorporation and Date commence are not applicable

Zero - Zero rated client in which GST is not applicable
Standard - Standard rated client in which GST is chargableNo Tax - Client which is exempted from GST charges
A 3 digit sort key to facilitate accessing of file in Client 's Master Listing, Balance Listing, Statement of Account and Ageing Analysis. Can be use to code type of business.

Grouping of client into industrial group such as Bankers, Co mmissioner of Oath / Notary Public, Developers, Finance Comp anies, Insurance, Others etc
This is to facilitate printing the report Analysis of Fees b y Industries
The Industrial group code has to be created in Misc Table Ma intenance under the heading 'IND GROUP'

Further sub grouping of industrial group for report 'Analysi s of Fees by Industries'
Eg For Industrial group Bankers, it can be sub group into Lo cal, Foreign, Offshore, Merchant etc
Sub group code has to be created in Misc Table Maintenance u nder the heading 'IND SUBGR'
Date in which the Client's master record is created.
Credit terms for client (if applicable)
Credit limit for client (if applicable)

Credit Rating of Client. Ie Good, Bad etc.
Info will be printed in Aged Receivable listing with detaile d transactions.
Display the date in which the last file was created for this client.
Display the total no of files created for this client for th e current year
Display the total no of files created for this client up til l to date
The full name of the client. If length of field is not suffi cient to key in the full name, user is still able to extend the name under the NAME & ADDRESS MAINTENANCE program
The party that introduce the client to the legal firm
The senior partner in which this client belongs to
The partner in which this client's belong to. This field is to facilitate accessing of accounts by partners in Client's balance lisiting
The main solicitor in charge of this client. This field is to facilitate accessing of accounts by lawyer in charge in C lient's Balance Listing.
A 2 digit code defined in Misc Table Maintenance with the ta ble header 'COUNTRY'
Date in which the company is incorporated. Applicable for cl ient in which the secretarial work is done by the legal firm
Date in which the company commence business. Applicable in w hich the legal firm perform secretarial work for client
To provide a brief description on the type of business the c lient engaged in
General description of client. Can use it to enter any infor mation of interest pertaining to client involved. This infor mation field will be printed in Account Master Listing
A unique 10 character ID assigned to client.
Alternate sort key to facilitate printing of reports. Eg type of business
The solicitor in charge of the client.
Partner in charge of the client
Senior Partner in charge of the client
Client full name.
Country in which the client is based
Date of incorporation. Relevant only for case of incorporation.
Date of commencement of business. Relevant only for case on incorporation.
Client's phone number
Client's Fax number
Type of business the client engaged
The introducer party
General desc of client or any remark
Display field on the creation date of the last file created for client
Display field on the total no of matters per client. Incremented by system
Display field on total no of file for the current year
Credit terms in days. Enter a '-' to suppress printing of terms on bill
Credit Limit set for client
Credit Rating of Client. Will be printed in Aged Rece'vable listing
Display Month to Date Billing
Display Year to Date Billing
Display date in which the client record is created
Industrial group code in Misc Table Master
Industrial sub group code in Misc Table Master.

This program enables new accounts to be created, existing ac counts to be amended, reviewed, deleted or deactivated. If f inancial balances exist, an account may not be deleted or de activated. The amend routine permits the change of any accou nt detail other than the account number or the account balan ce. Any changes to the account balance must be made via the posting entry program within the batch posting.
The maintenance functions provided are
CREATE - (Ctrl C) Create new account. All details except financ ial balances can be amended. MODIFY - (Ctrl M) Amend existing account. All details except fi nancial balances can be amended. QUERY - (Ctrl Q) Review existing account. The master file may b e displayed on the screen with this function, but no amendment can be made. DELETE (Select DELETE button) Delete existing account. Accounts may only be
deleted from the file when all financial and s tatistics fields are zero. Sales statisti cs fileds are cleared at financial year end and acounts deactivated wou ld be removed at this time. Accounts deleted usin g this function are permanently removed from the data base without being transferred to the history files. It is mainly used to remove accounts wrongly created or unimportant case records not to be referenced in future.
DEACT (Select Deact button) Deactivate function exists to close accounts th at re completed and presumably no more transact ions are expected subsequently. The year end house-keepi ng routine will purge the case detail records from the active database and move them to the histo ry files. All related transactions are purged without being a rchived.
If a transaction associated with a deactivated account is detected during a posting, the user will be prompted to reject the transaction or to reactive the ac count. Re-activation is effected on-line and processed
according to the rules below :
i. If the physical record has not been transfe rred to the history file the account record status is reset to 'Active' again ii. If the physical record has already been tr ansferred to the history file, it shall be removed from the history file and re-created in the active account master. The account status is further rese t to 'Active'
File No in YYNNNNNCSL format : YY-Year, C-Check digit, SL- Sales Sol
Display field on the file sequence no created for the Client ID
The security group of the User who created the file
Date on which the file is opened
Date on which the File is closed or deactivated
Date on which the Case file is re-activated
3 digit desc code of the type of case as defined by user
Subject matter of the case. Desc will be printed on On-line receipt and bill
Name of the conflict party with reference to this matter
Capture client code of old system
Capture Matter Reference of old system
The Client ID code of the client for this matter.
Index key to facilitate accessing of files in case indexing program
Index key to facilitate accessing of files in Case Indexing program
Index key to facilitate accessing of files in Case Indexing program
Updated by system when there are anticipated disbursments billed.
Updated by system whenever the anticipated amount is received
Building/Estate key to facilitate accessing of file in Case Indexing Program
Working solicitor code. Has to be updated whenever there is a change
Other solicitor working on this matter
Display the ex-solicitor that was working on the case
Clerk / Secretary initial
Partner code on file
Senior Partner of this file (if any)
Stakeholder funds held. Updated through batch posting or online entry
Date the stakeholder fund is placed. Updated by system on posting receipt
Relevant for Fixed Deposit Master File. Enter maturity date for FD
Billing charge code. For on line consultation bill
User-defined FD group eg A-Auto Renewal, 3-Mature in 3 months etc
Any remark regarding the file
Display field on fees billed as updated by accounts
Status of file - Active or Deactivated
Department linked through case type code
Fixed Deposit principal amount
Date on which the stakeholder fund expires
The GL bank code in which the client's monies will be deposited

Display the status of the File. Ie whether it is Active or C losed. A file will only have a closed status if the user has select ed the deactivated function button to close the file.
User is suppose to deactivate a file when the file is manual ly closed.

GST Code
Zero Rated : Tax at 0%
Non Tax : exempt from GST
Standard Rated : Tax at 3%

A 3 digit description of the type of case as defined by user . User can press F5 or click zoom to obtain a list of case typ e created in the system. If there is any addition / amendment / deletion required for the list, user need to inform the pe rson incharge to maintain the list.
This list of case type is useful for the following purposes :
a. Enable user to generate report base on the case type co de defined. Eg Solicitor Productivity by Case Type b. Case Statistics on the no of files under the specified case type.

The department code attached to the Case Type.
This code is used for Reports that print statistics by depar tment code.
If the user change the Case Type's Department code, all hist orical records have to be updated using a utility program
The Group attached to the User ID. This code is significant only if the Security System is installed.
Display the no of files in which the Client has with the Leg al Firm.

To enter the Client Bank Code in General Ledger System. Ie the Bank A/c in which the client's monies will be deposit ed.
If it is unknown at the point of creating the record, user c an entered the most commonly use Client's Bank code.
To capture the date in which the file is opened. It is defau lted to the System Date.
This field is updated whenever the file is deactivated by th e user. It will capture the date in which deactivation is do ne by the user.
Reflects the date in which the deactivated file is re-activa ted.
To provide a brief description of the subject matter. The de scription should be meaningful as it will appear on the offi cial receipt and bill to be sent to Client

A 10 alpha-numeric code assigned to the Client's name. Please refer to CLIENT MASTER MAINTENACE on the creation of CLIENT ID code.
Entry is validated against the Client Masters record. If the Client Master record is not created, user can create the CL IENT ID code by clicking the CREATE ID button.

Name Key 2 to 4 are index key which facilitate accessing of files in case indexing option. User is free to assign an ind ex which can be associated with the case and allow him/her t o access the relevant files with the indexes.
The name key can also be used in situation in which the case involves more than one client. (Ie If the firm is in charge for both buyer and seller in a Purchase & Mortgage Case), t he 2nd index key can be used as the other Client ID.
Or in a mortgage case, the 2nd key can be used to assign the institution of loan. This would enable the user to list a l ist of all the cases involving the particular institution of loan.
At the point of closing the file and transferring it to the warehouse, user can update the Name Key 4 to capture the war ehouse and box no in which the physical file is placed. If t his file is required to be access in the future, user can us e the case indexing program to determine which warehouse and which box the physical file is placed.
Can be used as Building / Estate / Project Key. It facilitat es accessing of files by building / Estate in cases which in volves any building / estate.

To capture old Client Code before computerisaton.
User can use the Case Indexing Program to access the file by specifying the old client code in situation in which the on ly information available on hand is the old client code

To catpure the old matter / file reference before computeris ation.
User can use this old matter reference to retrieve the file and get the new computerise file reference.
Senior Partner in which the file belongs to
Partner in which the file belongs to

Working lawyer code. This code will serve as the default sol code for updating solicitor's performance statistics. If th ere is any change in the lawyer handling the case, the user MUST change the sol code in the account master. Else, the so licitors performance will not reflect the true picture of th e productivity of individual solicitor.
Name of the secretary handling the file.
To capture other working lawyers co-handling the case.

Relevant for certain cases in which a third party may create a conflict of interest of the legal firm were to service or accept his case.
Eg Divorce case - the wife first approach the legal firm for filing of divorce. Hence, the husband becomes a party with conflict of interest and the legal firm should not service o r accept his case.
Other party that may pose a conflict fo interest includes : the clients whom the solicitor wants to take instruction fro m, the defendant the solicitor wishes to sue etc.
This field is used in the conflict of Interest Scan program to allow user to view on screen any party that is capable of causing conflict of interest.
The conflict of interest scan program will also scan the cli ent's database as created in the Client's Master Maintenance and the defendants / Plaintiff fields as entered in the Cas e Management File / Master Maintenance (If purchased)

Stakeholder amount deposited by the client. This field is up dated by the system through Batch Posting or On-Line receipt when the user specified the amount received as stakeholder amount. In situation in which the user is not able to specif y whether the amount received is for stakeholder or normal a dvance at the point of entry, he is allowed to amend this fi eld upon confirmation to reflect the true position.
Date in which the Stakeholder amount is placed. The date is updated by the system.
Date in which the Stakeholder amount will expire.
Enter any remark concern.

This program allows user to create Case Status / Time Cost M aster record for any of the Account Master file created in A ccount Master Maintenance.
CASE STATUS ============ Each case file is associated with a case type and are indivi dually monitored. The user will use this program to update t he status / time cost of the case file under their charge.Us er may selectivey inquire or generate hard copies of cases d ue for attention. Cases due for attention in a future date c an be obtained through enquiry programs. Exception reports o n cases not being attended can also be printed.
TIME COST ========= This prgram allows user to review or enter time spent on ea ch job file. The information on the total time spend on the each file would help the user to determine the amount to bi ll client. Work Sheet summary can be printed and attach to the bill whi ch helps to justify the amount of Fee charged to Client.
FILE / ACCT NO ============= This is the Account Master file reference for the status rec ord to be created. The File / Acct No must exist in the Acc ount Master file.

This is the Client ID and name attached to the Account Maste r record. User is allowed to change the CLIENT ID to any of the Index name key within the Account Master record. The new Client ID must be a valid Client Master record created usin g the Client Master Maintenance.

This is the case type associated when user create the Accoun t Master record in Account Master Maintenance program. User is not allowed to amend the Case type field in the Status Ma ster record. If the case type is wrong, user will have to am end the Account Master record and the case type for the Stat us record will be changed accordingly.
User can capture the Suit No or any remark for future refere nce .

This field reflects the status of this status master record.
Three type of status exist : a. Active - Implies that the case is not closed b. Closed - Implies that the case is to be closed and th at the status record is to be tranferred to history files when the year end routine is run c. Purge - Implies that the case is to be purged and th at the status record will not be transferred to his tory files when the year end is run.
Reflects the date in which this status record is creaed.
Reflects who is the user that create this status master.
For user to enter card / account / hire purchase / loan or any reference.

For Litigation case classification.
User can further group the debt collection case into . Account . Card . Card & Account . Hire Purchase . Loan . Ready Credit . Others
The information provided will allow user to retrieve statist ics on the break down of the specified type of accounts for reporting.
Relevant for debt collection in which user can capture the D ebt Amount owing by the Client.
Allow user to capture the date of Statement of Claim or Lett er of Demand
To specify the no of plaintiff and defendants involved in th is case.
To capture the period for payment specified in letter of dem and sent. Eg 7 days

Allow user to capture the estimated legal cost for this case . Amount entered in this field will be used to compare again st total billable time cost. If total billable time cost is greater than estimated legal cost, a message 'Time cost' exc eeded the estimated ###### !' will be displayed.
To capture the fee that the solicitor expect to receive.

For entering the name of defendent and plaintiff. To identif y whether a person is the defendent or plaintiff, it is reco mmended to put a (D) or (P) beside the name entered.
The name entered will be scanned when the CONFLICT OF INTERE ST SCAN program is activated.

This field is relevant for On-Line Time Cost Billing feature .
This field captured the time cost amount in which user choos e not to bill during On-Line Billing.
At the point of preparing a on-line bill, user would enter t he Billing Period and retrieved all the time cost transactio ns that falls within the period specified. The total time co st billable is computed base on the period specified. Howeve r, user can specified a lesser amount to bill in the current bill and kept the difference as Work-In-Progress to be carr ied forward in next billing.

This is applicable for On-Line Time Cost Billing feature.
This field captured the cumulative amount in which the user has specified to be waived when she prepare On-Line Billing. Any waival for the current on-line bill will be added to th is field.

Capture the title of the party . Corporate . Mr . Mrs . Miss . Mdm . M/S
This field is provided so that user need not capture the tit le under the plaintiff / Defendent name.
Suit no. for Litigation matter
Credit Card / Account / Hire Purchase / Loan or any other reference
Date of Letter of Demand or Statement of Claim
Period for payment specified in Letter of Demand
Estimated total legal cost
Expected fees amount
Number of parties involved in the matter
Name of the Defendant or Plaintiff
Title of the party - Corp, Mr, Mrs, Miss, Mdm or M/S
Time cost work-in-progress not billed. Updated through on-line billing
Time cost waived through on-line billing

This program allows the user to create and maintain client's addresses. If the standard name field in Account Master Mai ntenance is not sufficient to key in the full name, user can further extend the name under this program.
This extended name is used in On-Line Billing to print Clien t's name and address.
CLIENT ID ========= The Client ID used in Client Master Maintenance. If chained from Client Master Maintenance program, the Clien t ID is displayed by the system and the mode of function is the same as the mode of function for Client Master Maintenan ce.
If user select the option Client Name/Address Maintenance di rectly without going through Client Master Maintenance progr am. than user will need to specify create mode if she is cre ating a new client.
The Client ID used in Client Master Maintenance
The extended name of the Client
Names of the contact person. Pulled out as Attention Party in on line billing
Client's Address to bill.

If chained form Client Master Maintenance program, the Clien t name is defaulted to the same as that created in Client Ma ster Maintenance. However, user is allowed to further extend the name if the field in Client Master maintenance is not s ufficient to key in the full name.
This name will be used to print on the On-line bill.

Allow user to capture the name of the person to contact shou ld this be a corporate client.
The name will be retrieved as the Attention party in the On- Line Billing
Allow user to enter up to a maximun of four set of address. User can select any of the four set of address during on On- Line Billing.

ADD new transaction ================= To add new case status transaction, press <F4> or <Ctrl C>.A new line number will be generated by the system. This line number is computed base on the last case status / time cost transaction line number plus 3.
User can position the pointer at any line no and press <F4> to add a new case status transaction. However, at subsequent retrieval the transaction is sorted base on the Line # spec ified.
To move to the end of the table, user can use the menu bar < End of Table> button.
DELETE transaction ================ To delete any case status transaction, press <F3> or <Ctrl D>. The line will be removed.
AMEND transaction ================ Press <TAB> to move to next field. <Shift TAB> to move to pr eviousl field.
The specify a EVENT number so as to track the flow of events for the case.
To describe the activities that is carried out or is to be c arried out for the date specified.

Can press <F5> or click on zoom button to view the list of A ppointment Type defined to be captured.
User can identify the different appointment type that they w ant to monitor for the purpose of printing expiry reports :E g of appointment type list A - Appointment Date B - Bill of Sale renewal C - Comment entry D - Date entry E - Caveat Expiry F - Fixed Deposit Renewal L - Limitation period R - Due for review T - Trademark renewal W - Writ of Summon X - Close file
The system allow solicitor to retrieve events by Appointment Type in the following program : . Diary Management . Calendar of Events . Expiry report
By catorising the event into the appointment type, user will be able to retrieve the specified type of appointment in th e above program.
Enter the solicitor that worked on the case if it is a pass event . Enter the solicitor that is to take note if it is a future e vent.
Enter the Time of the appointment.

Skip this field.
Relevant for Dial In module only.

Skip this field.
Relevant for Dial In module only.

For Debt collection case.
User can track the no of installment payment paid by debtor.

Relevant for Debt collection case.
User can enter the Amount to be collected as the first statu s event. The subsequent installment payment amount will be catpured as a negative figure.

Instead of keying in events as it happen, user can pre-defin ed standard stages entail in the various case type. This is a one time creation and a maximun of 24 stages are allowed.H ence, for every new status file, the user can import the sta ndard stages created in the case type table.
For solicitor to write comment or reminder note
Relevant for Dial In module. In which the Dial in party will indicate what is to be done or carried out.
This function allow user to specify a range of line to be de leted.
This function allow user to re-organise the line numbering.

Date in the format of 2-digit day, 2-digit month and 4-digit year, separated by '/' on display not to be included in entry.
Not mandatory for input. Can be totally d isabled for entry via setting made to the billing system printing parameters.

A Single or Multi-line desciption.
Simply type on the line where the cursor i s positioned to enter a single line descri ption. Maximum no. of characters allowed is 50.
Enter Multi-line description in the scratc h pad. The scratch pad can be loaded by c licking its icon mounted on the toolbar. In modify mode, the scratch pad can only b e loaded if the cursor is position at the start of a multi-line description. Maximu m no. of characters allowed is 4096.
Zoom to pick standard desciption.

A user define text or a description of the type of total to be computed and placed i n the column by the system. The latter's background is shaded in white.
Entry is allowed only for user define text . As for the total , Zoom to pick from li st.
The list also offers a change to amount at tribute. The exact type can be pick from its associated list.

A numeric value.
To change the amount type, simply Zoom int o pick list. The pick list offers:
. A change to alpha attribute and it s associated pick list . Definitions of type for amount to be manually entered . Standard tables of amount computation . Extraction of amount from databases transaction

Goods and Services Tax.
This is to indicate whether the amount ent ered is taxable or not.
Type 'Y' for Yes. 'N' for No.

File or Account number. Refer to Legal_Pa c system for the composition structure of this code.
Enter or Zoom to pick from list.
System is programed to prohibit entry or e nsure the availability of this code during entry depending on amount type. If manda tory, it will first default a file number subject to change by the user.
Zoom to enter or edit more than 1 line description
Enter or Zoom to pick standard text. Press <F2> to undo
Zoom To Import Bill
Enter or Import/Zoom To Pick Bill For Modification
Enter or click on Calendar icon to select date
Enter Entry No for Output (Repeat same to consolidate. Skip to bypass)
'Y' = Yes, 'N' denotes non GSTable.
Enter 'Y' to bill or 'W' to waive or 'N' to exclude
Enter or Zoom to pick starting block line no.
Enter or Zoom to pick ending block line no.
Select before or after the next at entry line no to position
Enter or Zoom to pick entry line no to position before or after
Zoom To Position @ Line And Select Start Of Block To Cut
Zoom To Position @ Line And Select End Of Block To Cut
Move Block Cut Before Or After Line To Paste?
Zoom To Position @ Line And Select Location To Paste
Zoom To Pick Number
Enter 'Y' to pick, 'W' to waived or 'N' to skip
Enter 'H' for Heading, 'D' for Detail, 'R' for Reverse Detail Representation
